## Installation instructions

Get the latest stable `R` release from [CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org/). Then install `GeneralNormalizer` using devtool:

```{r 'install', eval = FALSE}
require(devtools)
install_github("fgualdr/GeneralNormalizer")
```
